item.title: Deluxe Room
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt.

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

What’s included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes
item.excerpt:encoded: The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

item.title: Mountain Hotel Footer
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
COZYSTAY

Established in 1998, CozyStay Hotel is a boutique hotel in the heart of the Swiss Alps, offering contemporary accommodation and unrivaled access to ski and hiking trails, immersing you in an idyllic setting against pristine skies in search of a truly serene experience.

Reach Out
  • Email: booking@cozystay.com
  • Tel: +41 22 345 66 77

item.title: Prestige Suite
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. 

Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. 

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

What’s included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes
item.excerpt:encoded: The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

item.title: Grand Deluxe Suite
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. 

Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. 

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

What’s included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes
item.excerpt:encoded: The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

item.title: Grand Deluxe Room
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt.

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

What’s included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes
item.excerpt:encoded: The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

item.title: Signature Suite
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt.

Family-friendly Amenities

Kids Swimming Pool
Extra Beds/Baby Crib
Washing Machine

Room Amenities

Air conditioner
Cable TV
Wifi & Internet
Towels
Slippers
Hair Dryer
Shampoo
Espresso Machine
Safe Box
Welcome Drinks
Pet Friendly
In-room Refrigerator

What’s included in this suite?

  • Private balcony
  • 140x200 cm Elite bed
  • Upholstered seat beside the panoramic window
  • TV-UHD screen for watching mountaineering films
  • Writing desk with USB ports for documenting your adventures
  • Room safe for your top mountain photos
  • Service station with Lavazza coffee machine, kettle and tea
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • Comfortable terry towels and bathrobes
item.excerpt:encoded: The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

Boutique resort offering timeless European luxury

Summer Week

The Swiss Alps are spectacular in summer, offering some of the best scenery in the world for hiking, biking, rafting and epic drives.

Extraordinary moments and special occasions are precious. Enjoy a premium suite and dinner for two as well as spa credits with this special offer.

Discover More Book Your Stay Now
Escape to the beautiful mountains where dreams come true. Immerse yourself in the restorative qualities of nature, far from the disturbances of everyday life.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
About The Hotel

Welcome to CozyStay, a boutique resort in the heart of Swiss Alps

Swiss Heritage Meets Modern Luxury
CozyStay in the heart of the mountains is an architectural masterpiece offering contemporary accommodations with unrivalled ski and hiking trails.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. 

Seeking a truly peaceful experience

Indulge, escape & relax in the mountains

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. 

Discover More Discover the Services we offered

The Essentials

Airport Pick-up Service

Lorem ipsum proin gravida velit auctor sde re sit amet space.

Housekeeper Services

Lorem ipsum proin gravida velit auctor sde re sit amet space.

Wifi & Internet

Lorem ipsum proin gravida velit auctor sde re sit amet space.

Laundry Services

Lorem ipsum proin gravida velit auctor sde re sit amet space.

Concierge Service

Lorem ipsum proin gravida velit auctor sde re sit amet space.

Health Center

Lorem ipsum proin gravida velit auctor sde re sit amet space.

Enjoy Your Stay at the Hotel

Spend your comfortable holiday in the heart of the beautiful Swiss Alps

Explore All Accommodations From $399

Signature Suite

60m² / Great Mountain View / 4 Guests
From CHF 2'900

Prestige Suite

200m² / Great Mountain View / 6 Guests
$799 / Night

Junior Deluxe Suite

90m² / Village View / 4 Guests
$599 / Night

Grand Deluxe Suite

55m² / Great Mountain View / 4 Guests
Discover the Services we offered
Get an overview of our outstanding additional benefits
Call Us for More Information

+41 22 345 67 88

Transfer Service and Luggage Handling

For our guests at our hotel, the arrival is effortless. We are pleased to arrange private limousine transfers to and from Zurich, Milan, Lucerne and Buochs airports upon request. Minibuses are available for groups. Guests arriving at the nearby Andermatt and Göschenen train stations, are met by a member of our staff who will assist with your luggage.

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Contact Us

For bookings and enquiries, please call us or write to us.

Contact Us to Get More Details

Let's start a conversation

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque.

    General Inquiries
    Hotel Info Center

    Business Hours: Monday – Sunday, 9 am – 5 pm
    Telephone: +41 22 345 66 77
    Fax: +41 22 345 77 89
    Email: info@cozystay.com

    Get Directions Reservation Details
    Direct Reservations

    Address: Rue de Lausanne, 1202 Genève, Switzerland
    Telephone: +41 22 345 66 77
    Fax: +41 22 345 77 89
    Email: booking@cozystay.com

    Get Directions

item.title: Dine
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Dining Experience

Enjoy a various amount of dining options from around the world.

Perfect Fine Dine Experiences

Experience exquisite cuisine at The Restaurant

The experienced chefs creates international specialties with unique flavors. Relax with gourmet cuisine and signature cocktails or homemade tonics, all enhanced by beautiful music and gorgeous views over the city. From seasonal menus to dining experiences to satisfy any craving, see what our chefs are preparing for you.

The Restaurant & Menus Check out all restaurants and bars

Interested in afternoon tea, bar, cigar lounge?

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

Afternoon Tea, Coffee, Cakes
CozyStay Lobby Cafe

  • Serves: Coffee, Teas, Cakes, Snacks
  • Hours: 11:00 am - 5:30 pm
Discover More Bar, Dinner, Cafe

  • Hours: 11:00 am - Midnight
Discover More Lunch & Dinner

  • Location: The 2nd Floor East Wing

  • Hours: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm
Discover More Dinner & Cigar Lounge
Cigar Lounge

  • Location: Rooftop
  • Serves: Lunch, Dinner, Wines
  • Hours: 10:00 am - Midnight
Discover More Dedicated Room Service

In-Room Dining

Refuel on your own schedule with seasonal, locally fresh items delivered to your door.

  • Serves: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snacks
  • Phone: +41 22 345 66 77
  • Hours: 10:00 am - 10:00 pm

item.title: Stay
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Rooms & Suites

Warmth. Care. Peace.

Comfortable Rooms & Space
Explore our refined accommodation options and find the perfect space for your stay.

All rooms have a bathroom with bathtub and/or shower, cable television/radio, free WIFI and mini bar. In addition, all rooms are equipped with a Nespresso coffee machine. Most rooms are carpeted, some have parquet flooring.

Check In: 3:00 pm Check Out: 12:00 pm
From $399

Signature Suite

60m² / Great Mountain View / 4 Guests
  • 60 m2
  • 4 Guests
  • 2 Beds
  • 1 Bathroom

The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

Discover More
$199 / Night

Deluxe Room

35m² / Village View / 2 Guests
  • 35 m2
  • 2 Guests
  • 1 Bed
  • 1 Bathroom

The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

Discover More
$219 / Night

Double Room

25m² / Partial Mountain View / 2 Guests
  • 25 m2
  • 2 Guests
  • 2 Beds
  • 1 Bathroom

The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

Discover More
From $1299

Prestige Suite

200m² / Great Mountain View / 6 Guests
  • 200 m2
  • 6 Guests
  • 3 Beds
  • 3 Bathrooms

The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

Discover More
$399 / Night

Grand Deluxe Room

50m² / Partial Mountain View / 2 Guests
  • 50 m2
  • 2 Guests
  • 1 Bed
  • 1 Bathroom

The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

Discover More
$799 / Night

Junior Deluxe Suite

90m² / Village View / 4 Guests
  • 90 m2
  • 4 Guests
  • 2 Beds
  • 2 Bathrooms

The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

Discover More
$299 / Night

Premier Room

35m² / Village View / 2 Guests
  • 35 m2
  • 2 Guests
  • 1 Bed
  • 1 Bathroom

The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

Discover More
$599 / Night

Grand Deluxe Suite

55m² / Great Mountain View / 4 Guests
  • 55 m2
  • 4 Guests
  • 2 Beds
  • 2 Bathrooms

The south-facing aspect affords unimpeded views of the Alps. Measuring 42 square metres, with traditional Alpine woods, warm fireplaces, and natural-stone touches.

Discover More
Comfortable stay experience
Most popular facilities

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

More About Services
  • High Quality Bed
  • Flat Screen TV
  • Bathroom with Shower
  • Spa Flip Flops
  • Bathrobes
  • Espresso Machine
  • Free WiFi
  • Furnished Balcony
  • Air Conditioning
  • Mini Bar
  • Refrigerator
  • Dining Table
  • Laundry
  • Safety Deposit Box
  • 24-Hour Security
“Everything here was great: the staff, the room layout, the property amenities with indoor pool, and the quality of the food. But the high point is the view from the mountains.”

Anna Williams – TripAdvisor

★★★★★ 5/5

item.title: Play
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
The Experience

From thrilling to relaxing. For nature, sports and culture lovers.

Explore the majestic Swiss Alps
Andermatt awaits you with year-round outdoor activities amidst spectacular nature. When it comes to leisure activities, the Alps are almost unbeatable.
Sports & Adventures

Winter Activities

Snowy Andermatt offers a wide range of winter sports. The modern ski resort is known for its sunny slopes, gentle descents, long, steep runs and deep powder descents. You’ll also find trails for winter hiking, snowshoeing and cross-country skiing.

Discover More 0 km Ski pistes 0 Lifts 0 km Longest descent Enjoy the sunshine

Summer Activities

850 km of hiking trails, 4 cableways, one golf course, several Alpine passes: there are many ways to enjoy your holiday in the Andermatt region – whether hiking, swimming in clear alpine lakes, Or go cycling against the backdrop of the spectacular Alps.

Discover More 0 km Hiking trails 0 SAC huts 0 Cableways

item.title: Relax
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Wellness & Fitness

Obtain a comprehensive stretching of physical and mental.

3,000-SQM Oasis for Wellness & Fitness

Wellness At CozyStay

Get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and find total relaxation at our resort. Access to a wellness center of over 3,000 square meters including spa, sauna, swimming pool, gym, yoga and pilates classes and more. You’ll find everything you need, from a dedicated fitness studio to an extensive range of fitness equipment. All carefully planned to help you achieve a balance of energy, body and mind.

Reservation by Phone

+41 22 345 66 77

Enjoy Your Wellness Journey

Everything you need to bring energy, body and spirit into balance

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. 

Facial & Skincare
Aromatherapy
Spa & Sauna
Fitness Center
Soothe your soul

Spa Treatment

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem.

  • Massage, Body Treatment & Facial Treatment
  • Two Saunas & One Steam bath
  • Bio- and Finnish saunas
Request Information Keep up your healthy routine

Personal Training & Movement

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem.

Opening Hours
  • Fitness Center: 7:00 am - 9:00 pm
  • Yoga Studio: 10:00 am - 9:00 pm
Request Information Day Spa and Indoor Pool
An ideal place for relaxing spa moments in a dream setting

item.title: The Restaurant
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
The Restaurant

Carefully curated menus incorporate locally sourced ingredients into exquisite dishes that reflect the locals and the world.

Perfect Fine Dine Experiences

Experience exquisite cuisine at The Restaurant

We are committed to create wonderful memories for all guests with every stay. Carefully curated menus incorporate locally sourced ingredients into exquisite dishes that reflect the locals and the world around them. Wherever you are in the world, we’ll take your taste buds on a journey they’ll never forget. Authentic flavors and culinary skills combine to create an unforgettable dining experience. 

Cuisine

Seasonal, Regional, Mediterranean

Dietary Habits & Allergies

Vegetarian, Vegan, Lactose-free, Gluten-free

Serving

Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner

Curated Culinary Experiences

Indulge your senses and discover new flavors

The experienced chefs creates international specialties with unique flavors. Relax with gourmet cuisine and signature cocktails or homemade tonics, all enhanced by beautiful music and gorgeous views over the city. From seasonal menus to dining experiences to satisfy any craving, see what our chefs are preparing for you.

Reservation by Phone

+41 22 345 66 77

Menu
Wine List
Dress Code

Smart Casual & Elegant

Reservation

Please call +41 22 345 66 77

Book Now
Opening Hours

7:00 am -10:00 pm Daily

Check out all restaurants and bars

Interested in afternoon tea, bar, cigar lounge?

item.title: Menu Page
item.dc:creator: kaylolo
item.content:encoded:
Our Menu

À La Carte Menu

APPETIZERS
Purple Corn Tostada
$36

Ricotta, goat cheese, beetroot and datterini.

Bruno's Scribble Seasonal
$30

Culatello, Spalla Cotta, Mortadella, Culacciona.

Fresh Oysters Dozen
$59

Our selection of fresh oysters, limes.

SIDE DISHES
Wild Mushroom Arancini
$18

Porcini purée, parmesan, basil.

Purple Corn Tostada
$36

Ricotta, goat cheese, beetroot and datterini.

Grilled Octopus
$30

Culatello, Spalla Cotta, Mortadella, Culacciona.

Fresh Oysters Dozen
$59

Our selection of fresh oysters, limes.

MAIN COURSES
Crispy Skin Chicken Recommended
$33

Ricotta, radicchio, prosciutto salad, cabernet.

Flank Steak
$35

Served medium rare, salad, mushroom sauce.

Alaskan King Crab Popular
$58

Truffle mash, pepper sauce.

Filet Mignon
$33

Atlantic cod fillet, chips, salad, tartare, lemon.

Fish & Chips
$35

Served medium rare, salad, mushroom sauce.

Beefsteak Tomato & Onion
$33

Ricotta, radicchio, prosciutto salad, cabernet.

Ebony Fillet Steak
$58

Truffle mash, pepper sauce.

Book Your Table

Make a Reservation

For banquet inquiries, please call our direct banquet line at +41 22 345 66 55 or fax to +41 22 345 66 89. You may also email us at banquets@cozystay.com. Book A Table
